text:
Putnam Exam | 2017: A1

Putnam 2017: A1\nFind the smallest such [imath] S \subset \mathbb{N} [/imath]\n[imath]\begin{array}{c}\n2 \in S \\\nn^{2} \in S \Longrightarrow n \in S \\\nn \in S \Longrightarrow(n+5)^{2} \in S\n\end{array}[/imath][imath]2 \in S [/imath] [imath]n^{2} \in S \Longrightarrow n \in S [/imath] [imath]n \in S \Longrightarrow(n+5)^{2} \in S[/imath]
